name: My Airport: Airplane Games
description:
Download Now! FREE “My Airport” game is specially made for Kids. It’s a pleasure to invite you to the airport games for children, Your Kids have time to get to know more closely how the airport really works.
Explore the Airline Managing System, How its work and take care of them as an Airport Manager. Practice in the flight simulator, As a flight attendant, you can even put stamps in the passports of international flights!, buying tickets, security check-in system, and loading luggage in the plane, help travelers at the lost & found desk. The kids will need to help the pilots to sort out the airplane and its interior, clean them of dirt, repair minor technical problems, and then go on to the new adventures world tour.

Features of My Airport:

+ Manage all the tasks at the best airport in the world
+ Issue boarding pass and buying flight tickets.
+ Check Visa and put a stamp on the passports.
+At Security check post, check passenger and their luggage by X-Ray scanner, make sure no prohibited items.
+ Some planes are not working in the hangar, please fix and clean it before the next flight
+ Check buttons and switches before ready for take-off the airplane in the flight simulator
+ Return luggage to travelers in the lost & found desk of the airline
+ Offer In-flight, Provide an Airline catering Service to every passenger. 
+ Be an Airport manager, managing all planes parking schedule.
+ Awesome graphics and music
+ Enjoy the Airport management game to learn to be flight attendant.
+ World best Airport Simulation Games for kids, Girls & boys and also for adults.

Enjoy the “My Airport - Airplane Game” One of the best Airport Manager simulation game ever.
